summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 4.0°C) and feels like temperature (down 2.1°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 12%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 13146 lux) and cloud levels (up 342 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 16508 lux), the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 540 m), and outside temperature (up 3.5°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, humidity should not be a concern and gentle light winds are expected. Drizzle or light rain possible, cloud cover will be low, possibly causing overcast or foggy conditions, and it’s dark. Weather could become unsettled.
